name: Forest Fighter (Fecalmancer, persoon, John Harger)
description:
A forest fire is raging out of control!  It's only a matter of time before it spreads to the nearby town.  Keep the fire at bay long enough for the townspeople to evacuate!

Controls:

  • W/S — Move Forward/Backward
  • A/D — Strafe Left/Right
  • Mouse —Turn
  • Shift — Descend
  • Spacebar — Ascend
  • MB1 — Spray Water

Credits:

  • Bill Kluegel — Programming
  • Brandon Baldwin — 3D Art, Technical Art, Level Design, Lighting
  • John Harger — Programming

Music by Kevin Macleod
